name: Supply Closet E
locked_message: You walk up the supply closet door and push the handle, but the door is held firmly by a deadbolt lock.
unlocked_after_key_message: You put the worn brass key into the deadbolt and turn it.  With a dull thud, the deadbolt releases and you open the door...
unlocked_message: You walk towards the supply closet and open the door...
